meanings.definition: The action of robbing a person or place.
meanings.sent1: The robberies in the city have increased recently.
meanings.sent2: The police are investigating a series of robberies in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent3: The robberies at the costume party were just part of the game.
meanings.sent4: The robberies of time by procrastination can be detrimental.
meanings.sent5: The vivid memory of the robberies haunted her dreams.

meanings.definition: The act of stealing from someone or somewhere.
meanings.sent1: She was a victim of multiple robberies last year.
meanings.sent2: The robberies at the museum shocked the community.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel's robberies of nuts from the garden amused the children.
meanings.sent4: The robberies of joy from her life left her feeling empty.
meanings.sent5: The robberies of ideas in the brainstorming session stifled creativity.
